Replace.Text: Which colony will make the most of Australia's natural riches? Lasts 60 Turns.

In this 60 turn scenario, you race to explore Australia, find its natural resources, and use them to enrich your colony. This competitive economic scenario has no combat. It emphasizes exploration and territorial expansion to increase your [ICON_Gold] Gold Per Turn net income, which is your score.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Single-player: Each difficulty has a [ICON_Gold] Gold Per Turn threshold. Exceed that number before the end of the game to win.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Multiplayer: The player with the highest [ICON_Gold] Gold Per Turn at end of the game is the winner.

Your fledgling Australian colony seeks not to repeat the success found in New South Wales, but to exceed it. Can you gain fame in these desolate lands where so many others have failed? Will your fortune come from locating long-rumored goldfields, fielding massive herds of livestock, or preserving the land's natural beauty for future generations?
A randomly generated Australian continent with the real-world outline.

+3 [ICON_Housing] Housing for any city on the Coast. Pastures trigger a Culture Bomb. Yields from Campuses, Commercial Hubs, and Theater Squares are +2 in tiles with Charming Appeal, +4 in Breathtaking.

+3 [ICON_Housing] Housing for any city on the Coast. Pastures trigger a Culture Bomb. Yields from Campuses, Commercial Hubs, and Theater Squares are +2 in tiles with Charming Appeal, +4 in Breathtaking.

+3 [ICON_Housing] Housing for any city on the Coast. Pastures trigger a Culture Bomb. Yields from Campuses, Commercial Hubs, and Theater Squares are +2 in tiles with Charming Appeal, +4 in Breathtaking.

+3 [ICON_Housing] Housing for any city on the Coast. Pastures trigger a Culture Bomb. Yields from Campuses, Commercial Hubs, and Theater Squares are +2 in tiles with Charming Appeal, +4 in Breathtaking.
Gain additional tiles when settling cities.
Start the game with a Prospector. All Prospectors trained in one of their cities gain 1 extra build action.
Start the game with a Grazier. All Graziers trained in one of their cities gain 1 extra build action.
